pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to COVID-19 Data Hub // Provides a daily summary of COVID-19 cases, deaths, recovered, tests, vaccinations, and hospitalizations for 230+ countries, 760+ regions, and 12000+ administrative divisions of lower level. Includes policy measures, mobility data, and geospatial identifiers. Data source: COVID-19 Data Hub https://covid19datahub.io.
